name: EatGhostsToWin
description:
Submission for Ghost (Bitsy Jam)

Based from the Pac-Man Game by Namco & Atari

Accidentally erase the game data at the last day of the jam.  So, this is a quick and simple remake. Have two ways to win/complete the game

and thanks to ayolland for the Borksy Game Hacker. Very useful & easy to use!
